title: Unique Bispectrum Inversion for Signals with Finite Spectral/Temporal Support. (arXiv:2111.06479v3 [eess.SP] UPDATED)
abstract: Retrieving a signal from its triple correlation spectrum, also called bispectrum, arises in a wide range of signal processing problems. Conventional methods do not provide an accurate inversion of bispectrum to the underlying signal. In this paper, we present an approach that uniquely recovers signals with finite spectral support (band-limited signals) from at least $3B$ measurements of its bispectrum function (BF), where $B$ is the signal's bandwidth. Our approach also extends to time-limited signals. We propose a two-step trust region algorithm that minimizes a non-convex objective function. First, we approximate the signal by a spectral algorithm and then refine the attained initialization based on a sequence of gradient iterations. Numerical experiments suggest that our proposed algorithm is able to estimate band-/time-limited signals from its BF for both complete and undersampled observations.

translated_title: 具有有限时频支持信号的独特三次相关谱反演方法
translated_abstract: 在许多信号处理问题中，从三次相关谱（也称为 bispectrum）中恢复信号是一项重要的任务。然而传统方法并不能准确地从 bispectrum 反演出底层信号。本文提出了一种方法，能够从至少 $3B$ 个 bispectrum 测量结果（其中 $B$ 是信号的带宽）中唯一地恢复带限信号。我们的方法也适用于时限信号。我们提出了一种两步信赖域算法，通过最小化一个非凸目标函数来进行优化。首先，我们通过谱算法对信号进行近似，然后根据一系列梯度迭代来改进所得到的初始化结果。数值实验表明，我们的算法可以从完整或欠采样的 bispectrum 观测结果中估计带限或时限信号。
tldr: 本文提出了一种独特的方法，可以从至少 $3B$ 个 bispectrum 测量结果中唯一地恢复带限信号，该方法适用于时限信号，并通过最小化非凸目标函数来进行优化。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a unique approach that can accurately recover band-limited signals from at least $3B$ measurements of its bispectrum function, which also extends to time-limited signals. The approach utilizes a two-step trust region algorithm that minimizes a non-convex objective function.
